A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If you go expecting this to be different from other Star Wars movies\, you will end up enjoying it!  The plot is good & and you see Rey\, Finn\, Poe & even Luke Skywalker learn life lessons & grow as a result.  I think this movie ends Luke's story & sets us up to focus on Re'ss\, Finn's\, Poe's & Kylo Ren's story in the next installment.  You'll get to see Leia use the force in a life-saving way\, and some terrific fight & battle scenes\, as well as some humor.  Go into with an open mind-I think you'll end up liking it!
